page.title: 07TRANSPORT
page.content: There are buses,taxis,trains,motor bikes,cycles and cars in Sawbridgeworth.We are on the Liverpool St.-Cambridge railway route, which is now fully electrified. The main road ,the A1184 is usually busy as Sawbridgeworth is situated between London and Cambridge.This makes several notorious junctions like West Rd.,Station Rd. and London(A1184)Rd.To try and help this, two mini roundabouts were recently built at this junction.Sawbridgeworth has three bus stops. The services are National Express main route,Local and village links.The local buses link up with some of the neighbouring villages.Most people in town have, and use, cars.Motorbikes and bikes are mostly ridden by younger people who are unable to afford a car.This allows them to visit other places.
